类 EmailService

public class EmailService extends Object

    • sendEmail

      public boolean sendEmail(String senderId, String recipientId, String subject, String content)
      发送邮件
      参数:
      senderId - 发送者ID
      recipientId - 接收者ID
      subject - 邮件主题
      content - 邮件内容
      返回:
      是否发送成功
